segments.text: That's all the general information of our company . I think you already have good knowledge about our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have an overall understanding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When we have the final results , we will call you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then when will I get a reply at the latest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you pass the interview , the personnel department will inform you within two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But if I don't pass , will you call me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry we won't . You can wait for two weeks . If you don't get a telephone call , it means that you weren't successful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then do I have the chance to get this job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry but I can't make the final decision myself , and I have to discuss it with other interviewers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . No matter what the result will be , I have learned a lot from our conversation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your mentality is very good and that's great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for giving me the opportunity of this interview .
segments.speaker: S2
